text_block_list.text: On my way to the training course to pick up something I forgot…
This time, the "President Showdown" is in the gym! We have to hurry up and cheer on Baku-chan!
I was curious, so I took a look in the gym to find――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: As class "president," I'll make absolutely sure of it! I shall win!

text_block_list.name: Classmates
text_block_list.text: Fight on, Baku-chan! Let's see what you're made of!

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: That's my line! I'm going to turn you into dust with my armband of the Public Morals "President"!

text_block_list.name: PM Committee Member
text_block_list.text: Gyaaa―! President of Public Morals～! I've got tingles～～!
…I was originally going to go get the thing I forgot, but I ran into a hell of a showdown!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oh, Trainer! You've come to support me!?
choice_data_list: No, I was on my way to get something I forgot…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: What's this!? If that's the case, then you're most certainly in luck! To have come across such a historic battle!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: The "President Showdown" to determine the president among presidents …So far, it's been a series of draws!

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Whoever wins today, the greatest of presidents! Shall she become…

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: The question is, what should the showdown be this time? For the 50th round, what the meat of it should consist of is…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oh, yes! Earlier, Trainer said you were going to go get something you forgot, were you not!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: How about finding the Trainer's lost item and whoever returns first is declared the winner… Now what do you think of that!

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: I have no objection! Because the ability to help others, a good role model makes!
And so, the curtain rose on the battle for the "President Showdown"――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: The winner of the "Deliver Trainer's Lost Item Grand Championship Title," the grand victor――is me!!

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Uuuuuuugh～!! I lost…! I couldn't even see the back of you……!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: However……Trainer, aren't you still forgetting something!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: …The class president knows. The class president knows that you haven't eaten for a while now, because you've been working on our practice menu.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: So, for my purposes, that is the next best thing to really having forgotten something. However, what you're really forgetting is――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: "Giving Your Hardworking Self a Break"…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Now, let's not delay, let's go! First, let's get that stomach to start Bakushin-ing up some food!

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: So this is the "class" president… I was completely and utterly annihilated. Both by her legs and the depth of her feelings.

text_block_list.name: Crowd
text_block_list.text: Truly the president among presidents…! Mesmerizing～～!
Afterwards, we ate yakisoba noodles so large they reminded us of the magnitude of the class president's feelings… We were full in both stomach and heart!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I did it, I did it―!! Now the strongest class president, is me!

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Kuuuu! That's the power of Bakushin, alright! What speed…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ehhen! That is true… however! It's all thanks to my Trainer, too!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I shall help my Trainer! And while I was running, I remembered our usual training!
choice_data_list: You've put what you've learned to good use!
You've put what you've learned to good use!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: My Trainer helped me! I delivered the forgotten item, and that I can return the favor… I'm pleased as can be about!

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Aaaaack―! A complete and utter annihilation! And the bond between the two of you was so touchiiing～～!

text_block_list.name: Crowd
text_block_list.text: That was such a great fight! Thanks for the truly moving display! Congratulations～～!
The reigning winner, Sakura Bakushin O, continued to bask in the applause of the crowd!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Uuuuuuughhh～～! I cannot believe my Bakushin has been… defeated……

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: This is the power of the Public Morals President! I'll take the title of the strongest president!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Frustrating… This is, frustrating…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: However! Defeat shall also become Bakushin's renewed strength!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I'm determined to win next time! Until then, you can keep the position!

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Fu… Now that makes me a happy president to hear that!

text_block_list.name: Crowd
text_block_list.text: Class presideeent! Good try―!!
The whole gym applauded Sakura Bakushin O's passion.
